record.title: GENERAL LEAVE
record.narrative:
GENERAL LEAVE -- (House of Representatives - September 05, 2007)

[Page: H10127]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that all Members may have 5 legislative days in which to revise and extend their remarks and include extraneous material on H. Res. 632.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Ohio?
